casebody.data:
No. 09-1175. Ferring B.V., et al., Petitioners v. Meijer, Inc., et al. 561 U.S. 1038, 130 S. Ct. 3505,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1114,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5279. June 28, 2010.

Motion of Intellectual Property Owners Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.

Same case below, 585 F.3d 677.
